content:
Iepriekš jau runājām par Bike DNA - veloinfrastruktūras kartēšanas analīzes rīku.
Tagad publicēts arī raksts:
https://mastodon.social/@mszll@datasci.social/110586801727206798

Būtu interesanti dzirdēt @Oto Ozols eksperta viedokli, vai šis rīks noder :)

Michael Szell (@mszll@datasci.social)
Attached: 1 image 🥳 We just published "BikeDNA: A tool for bicycle infrastructure data and network assessment" in EPB, introducing our new tool BikeDNA 🚲 🧬 with @ane@mapstodon.space @anavybor https://journals.sagepub.com/doi/10.1177/23998083231184471 BikeDNA is a :jupyter: :python: Python-based tool for assessing the quality of #OpenStreetMap and other bike infrastructure data sets in a reproducible way. It provides planners, researchers, data maintainers, cycling advocates, a detailed, informed overview of data quality in a given area. https://github.com/anerv/BikeDNA
Un nekāda saita viņiem nav, kur ir kaut kāds preview? Tipa tas ir one-time parsing pa datiem. Ja grib savā vietā, tad seko installation soļiem.

HellMap said:

Un nekāda saita viņiem nav, kur ir kaut kāds preview? Tipa tas ir one-time parsing pa datiem. Ja grib savā vietā, tad seko installation soļiem.

Var palūrēt uz demo report:

For an example of results that BikeDNA can produce, see a demo PDF output here: report.pdf

GitHub - anerv/BikeDNA: BikeDNA: Bicycle Infrastructure Data & Network Assessment
BikeDNA: Bicycle Infrastructure Data & Network Assessment - GitHub - anerv/BikeDNA: BikeDNA: Bicycle Infrastructure Data & Network Assessment
